prompt: Monitor AADE websites for deadline changes in the last 24 hours and generate immediate alerts for any critical changes affecting VAT submissions or individual tax deadlines. Process downloaded government documents and classify by urgency.
expectations: Downloads and processes AADE announcements from government websites
Uses OpenClaw deepread skill for Greek document text extraction
Detects deadline changes by comparing with cached previous versions
Classifies changes as critical, important, or routine based on business impact
Generates immediate alerts for critical VAT deadline changes
Creates professional Greek language notifications for accounting firms
Integrates with cli-deadline-monitor to update compliance calendars
Maintains complete audit trail of detected changes

files.name: monitoring_config.yaml
files.content:
monitoring:
  sources:
    - url: "https://www.aade.gr/epiheiriseis/forologikes-ypohreosieis"
      type: "deadlines"
      frequency: "2_hours"
    - url: "https://www.aade.gr/deltia-typou"
      type: "announcements"
      frequency: "4_hours"
  
detection:
  deadline_keywords:
    - "πÏοθεσμία"
    - "λήξη" 
    - "υποβολή"
    - "deadline"
  
  critical_taxes:
    - "ΦΠΑ"
    - "VAT"
    - "εισοδήματος"
    - "income tax"
    - "ΕÎΦΘΑ"
    - "ENFIA"
  
alerts:
  critical_delivery:
    - "immediate_email"
    - "sms_notification"
    - "slack_alert"
  
  templates:
    language: "greek"
    tone: "professional"

prompt: Set up automated AADE system status monitoring to track TAXIS, myDATA, and EFKA system availability. Generate uptime reports and alert accounting teams when critical systems are down for more than 30 minutes.
expectations: Configures automated monitoring of Greek government tax systems
Tracks system response times and availability metrics
Detects system outages and maintenance windows automatically
Generates business impact assessments for system outages
Creates alerts when critical systems unavailable >30 minutes
Provides workaround suggestions for system outages
Integrates with accounting workflows to delay automated submissions
Maintains historical uptime data for reliability analysis

files.name: system_status_data.json

prompt: Process a batch of AADE circulars and announcements to detect VAT rate changes, new tax regulations, and implementation dates. Generate professional Greek language summaries for accounting firm clients.
expectations: Processes multiple Greek government documents simultaneously
Extracts VAT rate information and effective dates accurately
Identifies new tax regulations and compliance requirements
Calculates business impact of rate changes on different client types
Generates professional Greek language client communications
Creates implementation timeline for new regulations
Integrates with greek-compliance-aade skill for rate updates
Provides specific guidance for different business sectors

files.name: aade_circulars_batch.json
files.content:
{
  "processing_batch": "2026-02-18_circulars",
  "documents": [
    {
      "document_id": "POL.1157/2026",
      "title": "ΔιευκÏινήσεις επί του ΦΠΑ για ψηφιακές υπηÏεσίες",
      "date_published": "2026-02-15",
      "effective_date": "2026-03-01",
      "document_type": "circular",
      "content_summary": "Clarifications on VAT treatment of digital services",
      "key_changes": [
        "Digital services to EU customers now subject to 24% VAT",
        "New reporting requirements for digital platform operators",
        "Exemption threshold raised to €10,000 annually"
      ],
      "affected_businesses": ["software_companies", "digital_platforms", "online_services"]
    },
    {
      "document_id": "POL.1158/2026", 
      "title": "Αλλαγή πÏοθεσμίας υποβολής μηνιαίας δήλωσης ΦΠΑ",
      "date_published": "2026-02-18",
      "effective_date": "2026-04-20", 
      "document_type": "deadline_change",
      "content_summary": "Monthly VAT deadline moved earlier",
      "key_changes": [
        "March 2026 VAT returns due April 20 instead of April 25",
        "Change applies to all monthly VAT filers",
        "No extension available for this deadline"
      ],
      "affected_businesses": ["all_vat_registered"],
      "urgency": "critical"
    },
    {
      "document_id": "POL.1159/2026",
      "title": "Îέες φοÏολογικές ελαφÏÏνσεις για ΜμΕ",
      "date_published": "2026-02-16",
      "effective_date": "2026-01-01",
      "document_type": "tax_relief",
      "content_summary": "New tax benefits for small and medium enterprises",
      "key_changes": [
        "Reduced corporate tax rate 20% for SMEs (turnover <€1M)",
        "Enhanced depreciation rates for equipment purchases", 
        "Simplified tax return procedures for qualifying businesses"
      ],
      "affected_businesses": ["small_medium_enterprises"]
    }
  ]
}

prompt: Handle emergency AADE system outage affecting TAXIS submissions. Activate offline mode, notify affected clients in Greek, provide alternative submission procedures, and track system restoration.
expectations: Detects major system outage affecting critical tax submissions
Immediately activates offline/emergency mode with cached data
Generates urgent professional Greek language client notifications
Provides step-by-step alternative submission procedures
Coordinates with meta-skill to delay automated submissions
Tracks system restoration and resumption of normal operations
Creates post-incident report with timeline and impact analysis
Updates contingency procedures based on lessons learned

files.name: system_outage_event.json

prompt: Generate weekly AADE monitoring summary report for accounting firm management including system uptime statistics, detected changes, client impact analysis, and upcoming compliance requirements.
expectations: Compiles comprehensive weekly monitoring statistics and trends
Analyzes system reliability data and identifies patterns
Summarizes all detected regulatory and deadline changes
Provides client impact analysis with specific recommendations
Creates professional management report in Greek
Includes actionable insights and strategic recommendations
Integrates data from all monitoring activities and skill interactions
Formats report suitable for accounting firm management review

files.name: weekly_monitoring_data.json
